title: Introduction to control
creator_credit: Michael Clarke, AEI Film Unit and Brian Kaufman
brief_description: Defines and illustrates the principles of industrial process control. Mechanical and automatic feedback control systems are compared and the film shows how automatic electronic control can be refined to handle a wide range of applications from huge and complex plant to the milling of a precision curve involving accuracies of 1/10,000th of an inch.
